author: Reuters
title: U.S. President Donald Trump warns China could face consequences for virus outbreak
description: President Donald Trump on Saturday also continued casting doubt on China's death toll, which was revised up on April 17
content:
U.S. President Donald Trump said on April 18 that China should face unspecified consequences if it was knowingly responsible for the coronavirus pandemic.
Also read | New York registers daily deaths under 550 for first time in almost two weeks
